channel.title: sdwdate time far back in the past when laptop sleeps
channel.description:
When I put the computer at sleep, the clock will stay still and be the same as before when I wake the computer up. So lets say I put the computer to sleep at 8AM and wake it up at 12PM, the clock will still stay at 8AM. With this time Tor doesn't connect and I can't find a way to make the time normal other than restarting Whonix. I have restarted sdwdate but the issue is still there.
So the question is, is there a way to make the time normal without retarting Whonix or messing up with settings that can make me more unique?
